author: clancyny.bsky.social
text:
I was never a smoker; but I grew up immersed in it. My father died from it.

As an adult, I worked in bars. That's how I, a perfectly healthy person, got serious bronchitis resulting in asthma that has never left me.

I got big sick every winter until Bloomberg made NYC "no smoking." 

No thanks!

author: bradthechimera.bsky.social
text: Nine years ago I came to New York City for a last-ditch clinical trial at Memorial Sloan Kettering to cure my post-transplant lymphoma. I was blind and still very sick. This year I’m in NYC to see the sights, play chess, and promote my new novel. How many blessings can one person count?

I was never a smoker; but I grew up immersed in it. My father died from it.

As an adult, I worked in bars. That's how I, a perfectly healthy person, got serious bronchitis resulting in asthma that has never left me.

I got big sick every winter until Bloomberg made NYC "no smoking." 

No thanks!

author: bradthechimera.bsky.social
text: Nine years ago I came to New York City for a last-ditch clinical trial at Memorial Sloan Kettering to cure my post-transplant lymphoma. I was blind and still very sick. This year I’m in NYC to see the sights, play chess, and promote my new novel. How many blessings can one person count?
